languages.text: "У них проблема с трактовкой писаний? Я знаю один священный текст, что исходит от Императора, и в котором разночтения минимальны — Лекс Империалис. Никто из смутьянов не посмеет ставить под сомнение важность закона Его или интерпретировать написанное. Так что пусть уймутся и учат от корки до корки Инъюнкта Кардинал".

traits.locale_text: "У них проблема с трактовкой писаний? Я знаю один священный текст, что исходит от Императора, и в котором разночтения минимальны — Лекс Империалис. Никто из смутьянов не посмеет ставить под сомнение важность закона Его или интерпретировать написанное. Так что пусть уймутся и учат от корки до корки Инъюнкта Кардинал".

languages.text: "So, they are struggling to interpret the scriptures? I know one sacred text that proceeds from the Emperor and that invites very few conflicting readings — the Lex Imperialis. None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His Law or misconstrue what is written. It would serve them well to settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover."
languages.original_text: "У них проблема с трактовкой писаний? Я знаю один священный текст, что исходит от Императора, и в котором разночтения минимальны — Лекс Империалис. Никто из смутьянов не посмеет ставить под сомнение важность закона Его или интерпретировать написанное. Так что пусть уймутся и учат от корки до корки Инъюнкта Кардинал".

traits.locale_text: "Could they be struggling to interpret the scriptures? I know one sacred text that proceeds from the Emperor and that invites very few conflicting readings — the Lex Imperialis. None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His law or misconstrue what is written. They can settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover, in that case."

"Could they be struggling to interpret the scriptures? I know one sacred text that proceeds from the Emperor and that invites very few conflicting readings — the Lex Imperialis. None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His law or misconstrue what is written. They can settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover, in that case."

None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His law or misconstrue what is written. They can settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover, in that case."

None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His Law or misconstrue what is written. It would serve them well to settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover."

"So, they are struggling to interpret the scriptures? I know one sacred text that proceeds from the Emperor and that invites very few conflicting readings — the Lex Imperialis. None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His Law or misconstrue what is written. It would serve them well to settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover."

languages.text: "Yazıtları yorumlamakta zorlanıyorlar mı? İmparator'un bahşettiği, çelişkili anlamlar çıkarmanın pek de mümkün olmadığı bir kutsal metin biliyorum. Adı Lex İmperialis. Sorun çıkaranların hiçbiri O'nun Kanunu'nun önemini sorgulamaya veya yazılanları yanlış yorumlamaya cesaret edemez. Sakinleşip Esas Buyruklar'ı baştan sona incelemeleri, onlara iyi gelecektir."
languages.original_text: "So, they are struggling to interpret the scriptures? I know one sacred text that proceeds from the Emperor and that invites very few conflicting readings — the Lex Imperialis. None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His Law or misconstrue what is written. It would serve them well to settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover."

traits.locale_text: "Yazıtları yorumlamakta zorlanıyorlar mı? İmparator'un bahşettiği, çelişkili anlamlar çıkarmanın pek de mümkün olmadığı bir kutsal metin biliyorum. Adı Lex İmperialis. Sorun çıkaranların hiçbiri O'nun Kanunu'nun önemini sorgulamaya veya yazılanları yanlış yorumlamaya cesaret edemez. Sakinleşip Esas Buyruklar'ı baştan sona incelemeleri, onlara iyi gelecektir."

languages.text: « Ils ont du mal à interpréter les saintes écritures ? Je connais un texte sacré émanant de l'Empereur qui prête rarement à confusion : la Lex Imperialis. Aucun de ces fauteurs de troubles n'oserait contester l'importance de Sa loi ou faire l'erreur de mal interpréter ces préceptes. Ils feraient mieux de se calmer et d'étudier l'Injuncta Cardinal dans son intégralité. »
languages.original_text: "So, they are struggling to interpret the scriptures? I know one sacred text that proceeds from the Emperor and that invites very few conflicting readings — the Lex Imperialis. None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His Law or misconstrue what is written. It would serve them well to settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont du mal à interpréter les saintes écritures ? Je connais un texte sacré émanant de l'Empereur qui prête rarement à confusion : la Lex Imperialis. Aucun de ces fauteurs de troubles n'oserait contester l'importance de Sa loi ou faire l'erreur de mal interpréter ces préceptes. Ils feraient mieux de se calmer et d'étudier l'Injuncta Cardinal dans son intégralité. »

languages.text: 「つまり、やつらは聖典の解釈に苦しんでいるというのですか？私が知っている聖なる文書の中で、皇帝陛下に由来し、解釈の余地がほとんどないものがひとつあります。それがレックス・インペリアです。ならず者どもは、皇帝陛下の法の重要性に疑問を抱いたり、その記述を誤読したりすることなど決してしないでしょう。やつらには、おとなしく腰を据えて『インユンクタ・カーディナル』を最初から最後まで読み込むのがふさわしい」
languages.original_text: "So, they are struggling to interpret the scriptures? I know one sacred text that proceeds from the Emperor and that invites very few conflicting readings — the Lex Imperialis. None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His Law or misconstrue what is written. It would serve them well to settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、やつらは聖典の解釈に苦しんでいるというのですか？私が知っている聖なる文書の中で、皇帝陛下に由来し、解釈の余地がほとんどないものがひとつあります。それがレックス・インペリアです。ならず者どもは、皇帝陛下の法の重要性に疑問を抱いたり、その記述を誤読したりすることなど決してしないでしょう。やつらには、おとなしく腰を据えて『インユンクタ・カーディナル』を最初から最後まで読み込むのがふさわしい」

languages.text: “也就是说，他们在阐释教义的过程中遇到了困难？我了解某种神圣的经文，这些经文由帝皇本人颁布，很少会引发歧义——这便是《帝国法典》。没有任何人胆敢质疑帝国律法的重要性，也没有人胆敢曲解律法的意义。让那些人都静下心来，把《红衣主教训谕》的每个字都读透，这对他们有好处。”
languages.original_text: "So, they are struggling to interpret the scriptures? I know one sacred text that proceeds from the Emperor and that invites very few conflicting readings — the Lex Imperialis. None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His Law or misconstrue what is written. It would serve them well to settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，他们在阐释教义的过程中遇到了困难？我了解某种神圣的经文，这些经文由帝皇本人颁布，很少会引发歧义——这便是《帝国法典》。没有任何人胆敢质疑帝国律法的重要性，也没有人胆敢曲解律法的意义。让那些人都静下心来，把《红衣主教训谕》的每个字都读透，这对他们有好处。”

languages.text: «¿Les resulta difícil interpretar las escrituras? Conozco un texto sagrado que proviene del propio Emperador y que no deja lugar a dudas: la Lex Imperialis. Ni un alborotador osará cuestionar la importancia de Su ley ni malinterpretar lo que está escrito en ella. Les vendría bien sentarse a estudiar la Injuncta Cardinal de cabo a rabo».
languages.original_text: "So, they are struggling to interpret the scriptures? I know one sacred text that proceeds from the Emperor and that invites very few conflicting readings — the Lex Imperialis. None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His Law or misconstrue what is written. It would serve them well to settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover."

traits.locale_text: «¿Les resulta difícil interpretar las escrituras? Conozco un texto sagrado que proviene del propio Emperador y que no deja lugar a dudas: la Lex Imperialis. Ni un alborotador osará cuestionar la importancia de Su ley ni malinterpretar lo que está escrito en ella. Les vendría bien sentarse a estudiar la Injuncta Cardinal de cabo a rabo».

languages.text: "Ich habt also Probleme bei der Interpretation der Schriften? Ich kenne einen heiligen Text, der auf den Imperator zurückgeht und kaum Raum für widersprüchliche Lesarten lässt ... das Lex Imperia. Keiner dieser Störenfriede würde es wagen, die Bedeutung Seines Gesetzes infrage zu stellen oder das Geschriebene falsch auszulegen. Es stünde ihnen gut zu Gesicht, die Injuncta Cardinal von vorne bin hinten zu studieren."
languages.original_text: "So, they are struggling to interpret the scriptures? I know one sacred text that proceeds from the Emperor and that invites very few conflicting readings — the Lex Imperialis. None of the troublemakers would dare question the importance of His Law or misconstrue what is written. It would serve them well to settle down and study the Injuncta Cardinal from cover to cover."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habt also Probleme bei der Interpretation der Schriften? Ich kenne einen heiligen Text, der auf den Imperator zurückgeht und kaum Raum für widersprüchliche Lesarten lässt ... das Lex Imperia. Keiner dieser Störenfriede würde es wagen, die Bedeutung Seines Gesetzes infrage zu stellen oder das Geschriebene falsch auszulegen. Es stünde ihnen gut zu Gesicht, die Injuncta Cardinal von vorne bin hinten zu studieren."
